member.exception: Thrown if the move is null.

member.summary: The Pokémon is asleep and cannot move for 1-3 turns.

member.summary: The Pokémon is burned and loses 1/8 of its maximum HP each turn.

member.summary: The Pokémon is frozen and cannot move until thawed.

member.name: F:PokemonGameLib.Models.Pokemons.StatusCondition.Poison
member.summary: The Pokémon is poisoned and loses 1/8 of its maximum HP each turn.

member.summary: Determines whether the AI should switch Pokémon based on the battle situation.

member.summary: Selects the best Pokémon to switch to based on type advantage and health.
member.returns: The best Pokémon to switch to, or null if no switch is needed.

member.returns: The best move to use, or null if no move is suitable.

member.name: T:PokemonGameLib.Utilities.Logger
member.summary: Provides methods for logging messages and errors to a specified log file with thread-safety. Logs are formatted as YAML objects.

member.name: M:PokemonGameLib.Utilities.Logger.#ctor(System.String,System.Text.Encoding)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified log file path and encoding.
member.param: The file path where logs will be written.
The encoding to use for the log file. Default is UTF-8.

member.name: M:PokemonGameLib.Utilities.Logger.LogInfo(System.String)
member.summary: Logs an informational message to the log file.

member.name: M:PokemonGameLib.Utilities.Logger.LogWarning(System.String)
member.summary: Logs a warning message to the log file.

member.name: M:PokemonGameLib.Utilities.Logger.LogError(System.String)
member.summary: Logs an error message to the log file.

member.name: M:PokemonGameLib.Utilities.Logger.Log(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Logs a message with a specified severity to the log file, with thread-safety.
member.param: The severity of the log message.

member.name: M:PokemonGameLib.Utilities.Logger.FormatLogEntry(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Formats a log entry as a YAML string with a timestamp, severity, and message.
member.param: The severity of the log message.
member.returns: A YAML-formatted log entry string.

member.name: M:PokemonGameLib.Utilities.LoggingService.Configure(System.String)
member.summary: Configures the logger with a specified log file path. This method is thread-safe and ensures the logger is configured only once.

member.name: M:PokemonGameLib.Utilities.LoggingService.GetLogger
member.summary: Gets the configured logger. Throws an exception if the logger has not been configured. This method is thread-safe.
member.returns: The configured logger instance.
member.exception: Thrown if the logger is not configured.

member.name: M:PokemonGameLib.Utilities.LoggingService.ResetConfiguration
member.summary: Resets the logger configuration, allowing the logger to be reconfigured. This method is thread-safe.

member.summary: Generates a random number between the specified minimum and maximum values.

The inclusive upper bound of the random number returned.
member.returns: A double precision floating point number between minValue and maxValue.

member.summary: Generates a random integer between the specified minimum and maximum values.

The inclusive upper bound of the random number returned.
member.returns: An integer between minValue and maxValue.

member.exception: Thrown if the Pokémon is null.
